column2:
"Ah, being a Cast is so much fun~!
It's always exciting when you find some new parts to use."
"I always enjoy customizing myself so much. But lately, I've been wondering if there's other ways I can enjoy doing that."
"So, I was looking for accessories that look good on Casts, but there were so many that I couldn't decide."
"So I'd like to hear a frank opinion from someone who knows me well."
"It seems that Mitarashi and the others are behind the counter on floor 2F of the Cafe. Could you ask them for their opinions?"
